name: Starry Moon Island: Cannon War MP02
summary: This is a Tower Defense game. Players break through enemy levels by installing different turrets on tanks. This DLC includes the map pack 02.

name: Star Wars: Episode I - Gian Speeder Chase
Stick Warfare: Blood Strike
summary: A mobile game which involves you, as a stick figure, to play solo or online multiplayer in various game modes against zombies or numerous enemies by using and upgrading various skills, perks, weapons and gears.

name: Steph IQ
summary: Compete for 100s of prizes in a live trivia game show triggered by Steph Curry.

name: Street Fighter Series
summary: Street Fighter Series is a collection of the first two Street Fighter games - Street Fighter and Street Fighter II. As a bonus two other Capcom games are included on the disk - Mega Man and Mega Man 3: The Robots are Revolting.

name: State of War: Warmonger
summary: Enjoy an unforgettable blast from the past with this classic real-time strategy experience. This all-inclusive bundle includes the original 22 missions from State of War (2000), and 16 additional missions from its sequel, State of War: Warmonger (2003).

name: Steel & Bone
summary: Explore the mysterious aristocrat's dungeon in this free and short but exciting dungeon crawler.

name: Starboost EX
summary: The closest experience you can ever get to becoming 'IronMan' in space.

name: Starry Moon Island: Cannonade MP03
summary: This is a horizontal scroll shooting game. Players need to keep jumping up and down the top of the turret. This DLC includes the map pack 03.

name: Starimu
summary: Starimu is a virtual world where you can express yourself and explore hundreds of unique styles. Not that only! But imagine a world where you can meet hundreds of people around the globe just by using your device! Get creative, play games, Join Events and have the best time all in one place.

name: Story of Seasons: Untitled 2024
summary: A new title for the Story of Seasons series to be released in 2024.

name: Starman in space
summary: Driver will be on his red car as long as possible to remain unharmed. He'll need to Dodge asteroids to survive!

name: Storm The Court
summary: The ultimate college basketball experience! Recruit high school phenoms, upset the top ranked team on your home floor, and cut down the nets every March after winning the national championship!

name: Steep: Winterfest Pack
summary: Dress up for the craziest party in the Steep Alps! Shred the mountain with a brand new sport, customize your style with fun and crazy outfits, and get ready to test your skill in Winterfest’s insane exclusive challenges!

name: Starry Moon Island 2: Mobile Stronghold MP10
summary: This is a Tower Defense game. The player controls the tank and breaks through enemy-controlled streets. This DLC includes map pack 10.

name: Street Fighter V: Season 5 Premium Pass
summary: The Street Fighter V - Season 5 Premium Pass allows access to the 5 characters joining the roster in Season 5, Dan/Rose/Oro/Akira/Luke, as well as new stages and costumes for existing characters.

name: Street Fighter V: Lucia
summary: This DLC adds Lucia as a fighter.

name: Stick Stunt Biker 2
summary: Stick Stunt Biker 2, the sequel to the smash hit Stick Stunt Biker (featured in the game of the year 2011 and 2012 categories) with more than 10 million players is now available! Bike fun and challenging tracks in different beautiful atmospheric locations and unlock various bikes like the chopper, the speed bike or even the hovering future bike. Avoid amazing obstacles while you master the tricky tracks, perform insane stunts and wheelies or relax while riding the chopper through spectacular landscapes.

name: Street Fighter V - Chun-Li Costumes Bundle
summary: This DLC adds different costumes for Chun-Li.

name: Starry Moon Island: Cannon War MP01
summary: This is a Tower Defense game. Players break through enemy levels by installing different turrets on tanks. This DLC includes the map pack 01.

name: Starwave
summary: STARWAVE launches you into a cosmic voyage of high-energy music and exhilarating freeform movement. Feel the rhythm of the universe as you soar through distant galaxies bringing color and light to the night sky.

name: Star Wars Mod: Galactic Warfare
summary: Star Wars Mod: Galactic Warfare is a modification for Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare. It is a total conversion that combines lot of the known battlegrounds, characters and weapons of Star Wars with the gameplay of the Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare multiplayer.

name: Stardust Defenders
summary: Stardust Defenders is a tower defense, roguelike, bullet hell, where you will face hordes of enemy creatures with the power of forest spirits, leveling up and choosing upgrades that will allow you to survive.

name: Star Sentry
summary: A tower defense game where player defend their star against enemies that intelligently circle around obstacles.

name: Starship Pegasus
summary:
This game is a clone of the arcade game Space Zap (Bally Midway, 1980). 
 
Up to 4 players can play this game, though not simultaneously (at least not on a TI system without an MBX device). It is unknown if Milton Bradley was planning on releasing a 4 way joystick adapter to allow for all 4 players to play at once, since there were rumors that MB was developing add-ons for the MBX system (such as a foodpad). It would not be surprising if this game was meant to take advantage of a certain expansion, since it is the only game from any company on the TI to allow 4 players to compete. In addition there are 4 directions that the ship can shoot in, making it possible for 4 players to all participate at the same time. However, this is all speculation, as playing it on a TI without an MBX system only allows for one player at a time to play. 
 
his game can be used with Milton Bradley's MBX System (an add-on for the TI-99/4A). The MBX allowed for the use of Voice Recognition, improved Speech Synthesis, a 360° Analog Joystick, and an Action-Input Keypad for video games designed for it.

name: StreamGods: Streamer Tycoon
summary: The ultimate streamer life simulation! RPG simulation featuring in-game AI-powered social network, robust Room Build mode and a ton of customizations.

name: Stonegeon
summary: Stonegeon is a 2D action game with adventures in the dungeon. By fighting monsters, collecting resources, making items, searching treasure chests in the dungeon, and finally to the deepest part of the dungeon, unlock the long sealed secret.

name: Star Trek: Starship Creator
summary: Build your own Starship and save the galaxy Star Trek Style!

name: Stylish Girls
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Starry Moon Island: Star Ocean MP06
summary: This is a Top-Down shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the protagonist destroying the space surveillance system of the fat pig king. This DLC includes map pack 06.

name: Stratosfall
summary: Stratosfall is an epic experience loaded with beautiful graphics and engaging gameplay. Build your base, research technology, and repel the enemy onslaught.

name: Startling Adventures
summary: Startling Adventures is an adventure game, developed and published by Capcom, which was released in Japan, 2001 for the original PlayStation console. The game contains three stories.

name: SteelRacer
summary: Join the ultimate battle in an abandoned steel work factory. In this fast-paced multiplayer game, you'll take control of a powerful car armed with a variety of weapons, from machine guns to rocket launchers, and face off against other players from around the world.

name: Star Revenge 0: Galaxy of Origins
summary: Star Revenge 0: Galaxy of Origins is a ROM Hack created by BroDute and released in 2020. It is a prequel to Star Revenge 1: Star Takeover, Star Revenge Redone and Star Revenge 1.5: Star Takeover Redone, making it the first game in the Star Revenge timeline.

name: StarFighter R&D HD Edition
summary:
STARFIGHTER INC NEEDS YOU!

Congratulations on your promotion to head of Research and Development for StarFighter Incorporated!

We make the best Starfighters in the galaxy! Or at least we used to make the best Starfighters in the galaxy. Now we are woefully behind the competition.

It's up to you to research, build, and test new Starfighter designs and technologies.

Don't let the company down!

name: Starvoly
summary: Starvoly is a singleplayer, survival and crafting game.In this struggle for survival, you have to think not only of yourself but also of the needy villagers.Maybe your pet will accompany you on this road. What do you think? Can you survive ?But be wary of the giant spiders!

name: Stick With It
summary:
Tap to jump, stick to stuff. Simple, right? 
 
You control a squishy blob that can stick to almost anything. Time the moving arrow and tap to jump. Stick your way up terrain, metal beam things, pipes, moving platforms, spinning platforms, and more.

name: Stuck Together
summary: Get Stuck Together in this 2 player co-op where teamwork is key to defeat waves of enemies. Each player controls one half of a character and must work together to defeat endless waves of enamies.

name: Starward Rogue + Moonshine Inc.: Galactic Spirit Bundle
summary: Get behind the controls of a mecha or craft moonshine - Starward Rogue + Moonshine Inc.

name: Stone Wheel 2: Bee Legend
summary:
Enter the world of the Stone Wheel!
Roll fast, jump, stay balanced and most of all, use your brain to help the bee-stone reach the lost honey!
Stone Wheel 2 is a puzzle platformer in which you must use all of your skills to complete the level and reach the honey jar!
This is the story of the Guardian Bee. He must redeem himself after losing all of the beehive's honey. The old, wise Rock gave you the power to become a stone wheel. With this power, you can roll fast and get back all of the honey stolen by the Big Bear!

name: Star Wars: Flight of the Falcon
summary:
Can you outrun the Empire?

At last, you can know what it feels like to pilot the most popular ship in the Star Wars universe -- the Millennium Falcon. If you also want to find out what it feels like to wear super-tight pants and a black leather vest, that's up to you. Star Wars: Flight of the Falcon challenges you to blast your way through the Empire's fleet as you recreate the Battles of Yavin and Endor.

name: Stars Collapse
summary:
The game tells the story of a young man named "Sunam", who gets trapped in the Stars Park place on his first day working there.

A virus has taken control of the restaurant, unleashing chaos and putting our protagonist in a lot of danger from familiar faces, who will take the role of our animatronic killers.

All of this while he discovers the truth of the death of one of the founders, years ago...

name: Steel Panthers: World at War!
summary:
The first project of Matrix Games, basically a remake of Steel Panthers using the Steel Panthers III engine. Includes MegaCampaigns, featuring branching linked scenarios.

This is the General Edition of the historical wargame Steel Panthers World At War and includes all four Mega-Campaign games and a free v8.20 of SP:WaW.

name: Starshatter
summary: The first in the Starshatter series from developer Destroyer Studios.

name: Star X
summary: Through nine unique and extreme environments, players fly in aerial combat both in and above the atmospheres of the galaxy's planets in free roaming and land fixed play modes. Players will need to successfully complete 22 intense missions and survive fierce air-to-air and air-to-land battles with an alien race in order to save their plane. A step-by-step training mode gives the best techniques and tactics to destroy enemy aircraft and perform land-based attacks.

name: Storage Chase
summary: Help the furry creature stay alive and overcome all obstacles in this challenging and dynamic 2D platformer - Storage Chase!

name: Starr Mazer: DSP
summary: DSP is side-scrolling, roguelike, shoot 'em up set in the Starr Mazer universe.

name: Stranded Engineers
summary: Stranded Engineers is a city-building game in which your strategy and economy skills are required. Build large citys on several islands, take care of your resource buildings and make your citizens happy.

name: Stay Home
summary: A small rpgmaker game where you stay home with your dog Peanut, and prepare a surprise party.

name: Stalked at Night
summary: Your name is Bill, a man that had a car accident in the countryside in West Virginia.You wake up from a car crash,not exactly knowing where you are.Before crashing you saw some big animal crossing the road and then following you for a while.Right now your priorities are to get out of this place.

name: Steel Machine
summary: You’re the pilot of the Steel Machine – and it is up to you to fight off an attack by 6 battle cruisers intent on invading your planet. They’ve broken through all defenses now Steel Machines is the last hope. You’ll have to fight your way through 6 levels of deadly combat and battle with fleets of enemy ships sent to destroy you. It’s your toughest challenge ever.

name: Sticky Clicker!
summary: A thrilling clicking adventure!

name: Start Running
summary: A horror point and click game where choices matter about trying to do your final marathon training run.

name: Steamboy
summary: Action game based off the 2004 film by Katsuhiro Otomo.

name: Star Versus
summary:
An independently made game for the NES. 
 
A competitive one-versus-one shooter; outthink and outmaneuver your opponent. Frantic and fearsome gameplay that's quick to pick-up but impossible to master!

name: Starfall Fantasy: Neverland
summary:
Stellar Fantasy: Neverland, a fantasy open world MMORPG you have never seen.
As soon as the star falls, a space-time hole that once existed only in dream suddenly opens up... Farewell to the past, from now on, you can be whoever you want to be!
Immerse yourself in a fully-featured, massive 3D battlefield where you can see ancient scenes transformed into a futuristic city! Team up with strangers and friends to overcome various hardships and be reborn. Be a different you and create your glorious legacy!

name: Streets of Rage
summary: The 8-bit port of Streets of Rage, released originally for the Sega Game Gear.

name: Starcube MMO
summary: an open world subculture urban MMORPG what kills the bad orcs that invaded Sun Street, A city of dreams and happiness

name: Starry Moon Island: DNA War MP03
summary: This is a Tower Defense game. Players not only need to install different turrets for tanks, but also need to manually control turret attacks to break through enemy levels. This DLC includes the map pack 03.

name: Star Destroyer
summary: You are a pilot of a spacecraft, your task is to destroy all enemies using various weapons. You need to move as far as possible into the depths of space. Collect elements from defeated enemies, they will restore your life.

name: Sticklings
summary: Sticklings is a unique puzzle game with the mission to get a herd of Stickmans into their goals by using various abilities. Like a Lemming, a Stickman just walks and walks and it is your objective to correctly assign the correct task to a Stickman to lead all other Stickmans the correct path. Abilities include blocking, self destruct, jump, bomb throwing, rush and bridge building.

name: Stellar Mess: The Princess Conundrum - Chapter 1
summary: Stellar Mess is a 2D point&click adventure game, set somewhere in Argentinean Patagonia. The game is inspired by early classic EGA games of the genre.

name: Starfire Skies
summary: In this real-time, roguelike deckbuilder, you will use firework cards to create a visually stunning fireworks display. Collect cards and build your deck before each show for your specific audience and get the best rating possible, a 5 star show!

name: Stickman Football
summary: Experience pure football fun with fast paced gameplay, an astonishing atmosphere, stunning smooth animations, simple controls, insane action and tons of replay value.

name: Starry Sky: in Autumn Portable
summary: Starry Sky: in Autumn Portable is a port of Starry Sky: in Autumn.

name: Story of a Tiny Earth: The Symbolic Ages
summary: Deliciously retro ! Spherical and labyrinthine levels full of traps and mysteries, with actions, puzzles and strategies. Find your own way, escaping malicious opponents and defending biodiversity !

name: Star Singularity
summary: Navigate your spacecraft through a galactic-scale mystery. Make sure to loot, craft and upgrade your space fleet: your combat skills will be tested against machine-learning AI, as well as your friends in versus mode.

name: Starheim
summary: Starheim is a free to play spaceship piloting MMO set in a universe based on Norse mythology. Materials collected by destroying AI ships, other players, and mining asteroids can be used to upgrade your ship, with dozens of models to choose from on your journey from a small fighter to a dreadnought.

name: Stan Lee's Verticus
summary: You are Verticus, a superhero equipped with a high tech, heat-resistant jump suit who must prevent the Earth’s destruction at the hands of an evil alien race known as The Obliterators!

name: Strike Solitaire 2
summary: The Solitaire/Bowling mashup returns, this time with a coastal theme.

name: Stinger
summary: Horizontal space shooter

name: Starship Commander
summary: Turn-based strategy game set in space.

name: Strawberry Cubes
summary: Strawberry Cubes is a very bizarre platformer with a minimal palette.

name: Stale Nation
summary: You find yourself playing as Thomas, a young man who recently reaches the end of the trail after a long hiking trip. He comes home to a world plunged into chaos from an outbreak of infection that turns people into rabid beasts. Will you help Thomas find a way out of this madness?

name: Stay at Home
summary:
"...We can't be friends. Because we're the same person."

Your future self wants to stop you from going to school.

name: Star Warfare: Alien Invasion
summary: Star Warfare Alien Invasion is a third person shooter for Smartphones featuring single player, co-op, and PvP multiplayer modes

name: Stellagate
summary: Stellagate is a puzzle action with gates that can connect different locations. The connected areas are seamlessly connected to each other, and you are free to throw blocks or lasers through them.

name: Starlink Battle For Atlas: Neptune Starship Pack
Star Freight
summary: Can you deliver the goods? Board your spaceship and go!

name: Station 228
summary: Help the guard Ramses get out of this damn station. You need to go home to your family. Your awaits an incredible journey.

name: Step Up
summary: Step Up is a platform game in which you control an alien that has to reach his space ship at the roof of the building. To get there you have to climb the ladders but you are chased by mice, bats, cats, and spiders... Don't let them get you or you will never see your home planet again.

name: Style Lab: Fashion Design
summary: The Style Lab brand brings you another innovative game-to-reality title, Style Lab Fashion Design! Now players can not only design their own fashions in the game, but they can wear them in real life too! Develop your own distinct style of customized clothing and accessories, share them with friends via your own web gallery, then wear your own unique fashions!

name: Steeldom
summary: Steeldom is a Sega Saturn three-dimensional arena fighting game developed and published by Technosoft. Released exclusively in Japan in September 1996, it was sold alongside a Taisen Cable-compatible version for use with multiple Saturn systems, and would later receive modern ports to the PlayStation 3, PlayStation Portable, and PlayStation Vita in November 2016.

name: Star General
summary: Based on The Fleet sci-fi anthology series by David Drake, etcetera. Released to coincide with the re-release of the book series.

name: Study of Unusual: Forest of Secrets
summary: In Study of Unusual: Forest of Secrets you are secret agent which went to unusual forest. You need to find out the reason of people disappearing. During the investigation you need to unravel the mystery of the forest, collecting notes and documents of disappeared people and try to stay alive.

name: Star Drift
summary: Drift on Dirt, Snow and Ice in this challenging Top-Down Racing Game. Play through the Single Player Campaign or battle your friends in Local and Online Multiplayer.

name: Stickman Basketball 2017
summary:
*** SPECIAL WEEKEND ONLY SALE, 50% OFF *** Experience pure basketball fun with fast paced gameplay, an astonishing atmosphere, stunning smooth animations, simple controls, insane action and tons of replay value. Choose your favourite team and rank up while playing various seasons, cups and events in spectacular arenas or simply dominate in street basketball. Decide whether you want full control over your players with manual running and shoot timing or use the automatic running mode where you have control over precise pass timing and watch your players performing spectacular unbelievable dunks . Choose from 115 different skilled teams and lead them to glory!

No IAP purchase required, everything playable without having to pay or purchase anything!

Stickman Basketball 2017 features more than 115 teams, tons a leagues, cups and even the official WBCBL women league.

* Quick Game, Seasons, Leagues, Cups, Knock Out, Tutorial and Special Graveyard mode 
* 115 different basketball teams to choose from
* Official WBCBL teams
* Team Editor
* Multiplayer mode with up to 4 controllers
* Party mode, Play with up to 4 players on one device
* Tons of unlock-able content like dunks, various balls, …
* Full Controller support for up to 4 players
* Complete Seasons, Cups, Knock Outs to challenge in
* 4 difficulty levels for longterm motivation (easy, medium, hard)
* Simple yet powerful touch controls with timing control
* Automatic or Manual Running
* Smooth animations with 60 frames per second

name: Starship Survivor
summary: Starship Survivor is a VR game built from the ground up to deliver free-moving, exciting action combat gameplay with elements of strategy and tower defense. Set in an alien-type thriller environment with dark rooms, your mission is to restore power to the very ship that turned against you.

name: Steps From Above
summary: Survival Experience and a capturing story

name: Staggy the Boy Scout Slayer II
Storms
summary: Storms is an in-depth open-world ARPG. Traverse the vast skill tree and purchase game-changing skills. The loot system is comprehensive, with over 80 standard items, generated magic/rare items, and over 140 specially designed "unique" items. Build fortresses, craft waypoints, find loot, and survive.

name: Streets of Handbags
summary: A shopping-themed rogue-lite game with cooking elements!

name: Static Shift Racing
summary: Modify your car, choose from an endless assortment of customization options, then take your ride to the streets to prove your metal on the pavement. Verse real players in an open world made for racing!

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 2 - Terry
summary:
Terry is the second DLC character in the Street Fighter 6: Year 2 Character/Ultimate Pass.

A passionate fighter that hones his craft as he travels all over the world. Also known as the "Hungry Wolf". He came to Metro City after hearing about the opening of the Pao Pao Cafe.

name: Steel Civilizations
summary: Build your steel empire and bring it to victory fighting your opponents.

name: Star: M
summary: Diverse worlds, diverse battlefields, diverse gameplay, diverse appreciation, and diverse fun!

name: Star Armada
summary: Embark on a thrilling spaceship auto-battler adventure in Star Armada a strategic space combat game where you build, customize, and command your ultimate fleet of capital spaceships, unlocking new upgrades and abilities to help you survive against your enemies.

name: Star Wraith III: Shadows of Orion
summary: Star Wraith 3: Shadows of Orion is an independent game developed by Star Wraith 3d Games using Dark Basic Classic. It is a military space simulator with a dynamic campaign. It is available for free from www.starwraith.com along with many of the other games in the series.

name: Stranger Things: 1984
summary: Join Hopper and the kids for bruising missions around Hawkins - and the Upside Down - in this stylized retro adventure filled with collectibles. It's 1984 all over again. Experience an action adventure game just like the ones our heroes would have played back in the day. Explore Hawkins and its surroundings. See your favorite locations like Mirkwood Forest and Hawkins Lab. Uncover exciting areas you've never seen before! Solve puzzles with the unique abilities of each character. Lucas can nail anything with his Wrist Rocket. Nancy has an entire collection of bats to swing this time. Collect all the Eggos and gnomes you can lay your hands on. You never know what they might unlock.

name: Star Honor
summary: Star Honor is a Roguelike space adventure where you are field promoted into the Captain’s chair of the USS Arduino. Your home world has become the victim of the a biological weapon deployed by enemies. You posses the only hope for your world, a cure for the phage. With a skeleton crew, a limping vessel and time running out, you must travel world to world, seeking supplies, upgrades and doing battle to make it home and save your planet.

name: Star Quest
summary: Star Quest is a third person single player game that integrates space exploration, flight driving, action puzzle solving, and gunfight shooting. The game is developed with Unreal Engine 5 . In the vast universe, you can start this exciting journey by driving your own spaceship.

name: Stonebot Adventures
summary: Stonebot Adventures is a Sokoban-inspired game with more elements added in.

name: Stella Pastoris
summary: Shepherd the last remnants of the Malthusian monks marooned on Proxima Centauri B. As the colony AI, will you delve into forbidden means to save your people or allow them to go quietly into the night? Set up production chains to spend limited resources to save as many as you can.

name: Stealth
summary: In Stealth, the player takes control of a squad of six U.S. Army soldiers in Vietnam during the Vietnam War. Gameplay is turn-based on a platoon's level, each squad member has the option to move, attack, wait, and in the case of the radio operator call in air or artillery support.

name: Street Football 2
summary: Leave the rules of football behind you. Play on improvised fields in the middle of the city and use the environment to your advantage. Walls and objects can be used to play your opponent. Everything is possible in street football without a coach! Take part in exciting competitions and exciting games and become the first world champion in street football!

name: Strange Labyrinth
summary: Amy is pulled into a dimension of labyrinths by the villain Ayashii Meiro, who mysteriously appears on her TV. Now, Amy must solve the puzzles of the labyrinths and defeat Ayashii Meiro to return to her world, collecting fragments of her soul along the way.

name: Strike Team Hydra
summary: Strike Team Hydra is a turn-based, tactical RPG that focuses on combat. Players will have to leverage morale, cover, special skills and suppressive fire to defeat a fearsome and ruthless alien enemy.

name: StarOS
summary: Tired of only seeing text on your personal computer? Get ready to make the leap to the graphic dimension with this new OS, the future is now!

name: Stellarons Superstars: Detectives of the Scarlet Horizons
summary: Learn about this epic story of a world full of mysteries, where the enigmatic "Stellarons" are your allies in the fight against an evil sorceress who threatens to unbalance the universe.

name: Stranded B
summary: Slip into the role of a refugee prisoner who has a boat accident while on the run and is stranded on an island. Craft your tools and weapons, collect whatever you can find, and build your own home. Discover, build, hunt, craft, loot, survive!

name: Star Conflict: Salamander. Weapon of Victory
summary: This pack includes:Kinetic weapon “CFER-24 nailgun”.Active module “Kongmíng manual controls”Unique modifier “Horizon System Event-24”Unique modifier “Adaptive polarizer Salamander”60 monocrystalsA set of resources for 50 ores: (Vanadium + Silicon + Graphite + Osmium) + 50 Crystal shards.

name: Stack 'em High
summary: Chose the position to drop each toy and pile them up high, trying not to let them topple over the edge. Pile up enough toys within the time limit to clear each stage! Challenge yourself across dozens of stages with various shaped platforms, or go head-to-head with a friend over Wireless Communications! Each mission has different criteria, such as a limited amount of time or number of objects. Three game modes available: Mission Mode 40 different missions where players are tasked with objectives such as stacking 10 cars or dropping 5 trains. Free Play Mode Choose a platform shape and toy and see how many objects you can stack up on top of each other within the time limit. VS. Mode Go head-to-head with a friend or against the computer.

name: Star Wars: Episode I - Podracer Game
Star Wars: Episode I - Gungan Sub Escape
Stak Atak
summary: Stak Atak is a cute tile-matching game where players are able to tailor their game to play how they want. With multiple difficulty sliders, a party mode, and local 2 player verus modes, Stak Atak is fun to play however you want!

name: Steel Gunner 2
summary: As in the original, you shoot at cyborgs while rescuing humans.

name: Starry Moon Island 2: Cannonade MP05
summary: This is a horizontal scroll shooting game. The players need to keep jumping up and down the top of the turret. This DLC includes the map pack 05.

name: Strong man parkour
summary: A parkour game, mainly for leisure, featuring the operation of a fierce man, using jumping and running walls to reach the pinnacle of life.

name: Star Chef 2: Cooking Game
summary: Welcome to the most loved restaurant management game. Join millions in cooking, serving, managing, and trading. Meet chefs around the world and cater to celebrations. Form your CHEF TEAM to combat time management challenges and become the MASTER CHEF.

name: Stay Alive
summary: Stay Alive - survival in the open world. You are an operational journalist, your task is to go to Russia and take a couple of pictures about fires in the forest.

name: Stunt Cars
summary: It's Stunt Cars!

name: Star Trigon
summary:
Star Trigon is a 2002 puzzle arcade game published in Japan by Namco. Ports for iPod, iOS devices and Windows were also released.

In the game, the player controls one of three characters - Wataru Hoshi, Chuta Bigbang and Susumu Hori - the objective being to rescue creatures known as "Uchijins" by hopping from planet to planet to draw triangles and capture them.
The player will automatically circle the planet they are on, requiring timed jumps to avoid falling off the playfield.

name: Streamonaire
summary: Streamonaire is a "Who Want's to Be a Millionaire" Style web based game, made specifically for streamers.

name: Starry Moon Island 2: Mobile Stronghold MP05
summary: This is a Tower Defense game. The player controls the tank and breaks through enemy-controlled streets. This DLC includes map pack 05.

name: Stick Fight: Endless Battle
summary: Stick Fight: Endless Battle is a game that combines puzzle, action, strategy, tactics.

name: Stunt Dog Adventure
summary: The "Stunt Dog Adventure" is a thrilling retro inspired 2D side scrolling action game. Collect bones, solve puzzles, swim and fly to rescue a team of kidnapped All-Star Stunt Dogs!

name: Starfall: Operation Outro
summary: Lead a powerful space battleship and bring victory to humanity in the midst of an endless war.

name: Starry Moon Island 2: Out of Control MP07
summary: This is a horizontal scroll shooting game. Operate the player to break through the enemy's pursuit and reach the level on the far right. This DLC include Map pack 07.

name: Stolen Crown
summary: Stolen Crown is a deck-building game with dynamic combat, diverse encounters, and powerful relics. Three different classes, paired with hundreds of spells and abilities, means each run has something to offer!

name: Standing on the Shoulders of Giants
summary: Isaac Newton receives a mysterious letter inviting him to investigate a new scientific phenomenon.

name: Star Fetchers: Escape from Pork Belly
summary: A action filled rouglite boxing game where you'll punch and claw yourself out of the fighting ring "Pork Belly", an illegal gladiator arena hidden in the outskirt of the Gray Zone.

name: Starry Moon Island: Mobile Stronghold MP05
summary: This is a Tower Defense game. The player controls the tank and breaks through enemy-controlled streets. This DLC includes map pack 05.

name: Strange Midnight
summary: The plot of the game will tell about the adventures of Alice, about her feelings for her grandfather.

name: Stitchcraft
summary: Stitchcraft is a two-player strategy game where the cards are actors, not proxies. Weigh decisions to wield your Tapestries as both wares and weapons. Weave a winning Showcase while shrouding your colors and surmising opponents'. If you master one Pattern, choose another for a new set of spells!

name: Starry Moon Island: Mobile Stronghold MP10
summary: This is a Tower Defense game. The player controls the tank and breaks through enemy-controlled streets. This DLC includes map pack 10.

name: Stunt Derby
summary: Stunt Derby is a throwback stunt car racer with high-fidelity physics, online play and a built in track editor. Master tracks, build your own, explore a variety of game modes and smash through stacks of boxes in this unique low-poly drive-em-up.

name: Star Burial Dragnir
summary: A JRPG by Square Enix and Witch Craft for iOS devices.

name: Steamed Hams: The Graphic Adventure
summary:
You've invited Superintendent Chalmers over for lunch! He'll be here any second and is expecting a well cooked roast!

Fortunately, you have been preparing just such a roast all morning! Hopefully you don't accidentally burn it and set certain events into motion...

name: Street Jam Basketball
summary: Street Jam is a three-on-three street basketball game for Game Boy Advance. Select your team from a roster of 15 teams and over 40 different characters and enter the world of street-ball. Your aim is to win all illegal tournaments held in various locations of the downtown. The individual players differ in game style, speed, special dunks and graphic presentation. Compete in the arcade mode and win eight challenging matches against the CPU, or partake in the story mode. The latter lets you select your team, and try to rise up in the ranks via five different levels from beginner to violence mode throughout 20 different tournaments with animated story sequences.

name: Stick Figure Movie Trivia
summary:
The Very Best Movie Trivia Game you've ever seen.
PlayScreen presents ... Stick Figure Movie Trivia, . If you Like Movies, you’ll love Stick Figure Movie Trivia! Identify the movie from a stick figure drawing of a famous scene.

name: Stone Flower
summary: This is an incredible journey through an abandoned city, in search of an ancient artifact.

name: StreetCraft

name: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
summary:
Sybok; Spock’s former classmate at the Vulcan School of Thought has used his mind-melding powers to cause the settlers on the planet nimbus to join his force. A Vulcan whose can show emotions, he has taken control of paradise.

Unpublished game ROM leaked by Lost Levels in 2006.

name: Star Trek: The Next Generation
summary: Star Trek: The Next Generation is divided into a series of missions. Players will start on the main screen of the bridge and from there can access Navigation, Tactical, Operations, Engineering, Transporter Systems and Mission Control. Mini-games are sometimes used to complete certain ship functions (such as rerouting power to the shields).

name: Stars in Shadow: Legacies
summary: It’s been three thousand years after the Great War and the collapse of the hyperspace lanes. The galaxy is reawakening, thanks to an unknown influence who has restored the warp lanes back into operation. Who restored the warp lanes, and for what purpose?

name: Star Steel
summary: "Star Steel" is a vertical scrolling shooter with a top view. Defend our planet from deadly alien forces.

name: Storm Warrior
summary: You play as a Templar-style Knight, the Storm Warrior, through various different style levels (or mini-games) including an opening gladiatorial clash with a winged demon, an atmospheric journey across the ocean to a lightning-lit island, and a battle through dank caves.

name: Starry Moon Island: Cannonade MP08
summary: This is a horizontal scroll shooting game. Players need to keep jumping up and down the top of the turret. This DLC includes the map pack 08.

name: Stuffo the Puzzle Bot
summary: A laid-back but smart puzzle game. Stuffo is the last remaining puzzle bot stuck in a world filled with bite-sized brain-teasers. Help Stuffo to solve the mind-bending puzzles by using various blocks to climb, push and teleport your way to the exit.

name: Storm of Wars
summary:
Storm of Wars brings real-time strategy combats to a kingdom building war game. It features fast-paced combat in cities and epic real-time wars on the world map that impact gameplay and strategy in fun, unexpected ways!

Attention, warlords! Do you have what it takes to compete in the most epic MMORTS experience ever devised? Build an empire in a world of magic and conquest, develop your city into an invincible stronghold, summon legendary heroes to battle your enemies, wage war across a sprawling map, and test your mettle against millions of players worldwide! Choose your faction, dominate your rivals, and become the mightiest ruler the world has ever seen!

name: Storm Across Europe
summary: The game allows to simulate World War II in Europe on a grand strategic scale. The player controls land, sea and air action and has to manage limited resources for production and advanced research.

name: Story Hour Adventures
summary: Story Hour is a collection of “interactive storybooks” – classic public domain children’s stories retold and recreated on the Nintendo Wii. In the same way a parent will sit with their child and read any number of classic fairy tale books, members of a family can sit in front of their television and read traditional fantasy tales with their child in an updated interactive format. At once a simple, casual game and a parent-led storytelling experience, Story Hour Adventure is beautiful, educational and fun for parents and children alike.

name: Strive
summary: Strive is a merge of the fast-paced, strategic gameplay of MOBA with the thrilling, suspenseful challenges of a good battle royale. Fight to be the last man standing or break the Emperium to go straight to the victory!

name: Starbinder
summary: Theme: An Unconventional Weapon

name: Stunt Copter
summary: Drop from a helicopter into a horse-drawn hay cart.

name: StormBorn: War of Legends
summary: Lead your ARMY of HEROES and unleash epic battle Abilities in StormBorn: War of Legends! PLAY FOR FREE in the revolutionary action + strategy RPG. Assemble your force of the mightiest Heroes in the realm – powerful Fighters, cunning Rogues, mighty Beastmasters, and more!

name: Star Castle
summary: A tabletop LCD port of the arcade game Star Castle.

name: Strike Zero
summary: In strike zero, you will play a girl who has lost her memory by integrating with the "Pi" fragment, and experience a series of unique adventures as a trainee pilot of the latest combat aircraft. You will find your memory in the crisis again and again and try to save the world.

name: Steampunk Abyss
summary: Blast your way through this Bullet Hell Rougelite. Fight the automatons that guard The Abyss. Smash the wreckage for scrap to barter with the citizens of Duc Pointe. Use the experience you have gained to climb closer to the surface with each run. Your experience and a few weapons of your design....

State of Decay 2: Ultimate Edition includes:
State of Decay: Year One Survival Edition (Console version)
Independence Pack
Daybreak Pack

name: Star Wars: Battlefront - Renegade Squadron
summary:
Star Wars Battlefront: Renegade Squadron is an all-new project in the Battlefront saga exclusively for the PlayStation Portable, designed to offer an all-new storyline in the single-player mode and extremely robust PSP multiplayer options.

The story in this game follow the previously secret "Renegade Squadron" that was made up of the galaxy's toughest scoundrels. As the plot unfolds, players will learn how Han Solo recruited and assembled his team and used their many talents for missions in Korriban's Valley of the Sith, the rocky remains of Alderaan, and the fiery ashes of the volcanic planet, Sullust. In addition to single-player story missions, Renegade Squadron allows up to 16 players to compete via Infrastructure mode (eight-person support for ad hoc), with a special 100-point spending system to purchase custom kits with more than a million different combinations that can be used to create unique Star Wars characters.

name: Starry Moon Island: Tank Advance MP06
summary: This is a Top-Down Shooting game. Use the player of a fortress attack from the perspective of a tank driver. This DLC includes the map pack 06.

name: Strike Force Heroes: Ninja Class
summary: New DLC introducing the Ninja class, and a number of ninja related items!

name: Steel Ranger
summary: Awesome run & gun action adventure for the C64 from the author of Hessian!

name: Start With Water
summary: Bring green back into the desert

name: Steel Panthers II: Modern Battles - Campaign Disk
Step by Little Step
summary:
Bring your cat back to the world of the living.
The rules are simple, as they are familiar:
Do not look back.
and everything will be just the way it was before.

name: Storm Area 51: The Game
summary: Leaked documents suggest that the government is hiding aliens within Area 51 - Cute girl aliens. Chads, Virgins, Kyles, and Otakus rise up and decide to raid Area 51 to get an alien girlfriend of their own. This is their story.

name: Steel Rivals
summary: Steel Rivals is a 2.5D fighting game for one or two players. Play tournament mode, survival mode or VS mode against the AI or another human player. Supports leaderboards and trading cards.

name: Step into the Abyss
summary: Step into the Abyss is a detective adventure that combines an intriguing, branching storyline, forcing the player to constantly make choices, and a dystopian world ruled by dictatorship. The noir style adds charm, and the unusual approach to gameplay will provide you with a unique gaming experience.

name: Starship Helmet
summary: Explore maps, collect cards, upgrade cards, and make money for RogueLike games.

name: Stickman Race Draw
summary:
Destroy the enemy and perform steep stunts on different wheelbarrows killing games. 
Get to the finish line alive or dead, win the fight with the strongest!

name: Star Trader
summary: A shmup/adventure game by Nihon Falcom where you travel to different space stations, earning money and upgrading your ship.

name: Stickman jailbreak 9
summary: The long-awaited new part of the escape from prison

name: Starboard
summary: Build a base or raid someone else's in this fantasy pirate survival game.

name: Start Survey 2
summary: Alone in a research station on a faraway moon, conduct an environmental survey of your surroundings to discover the source of the anomalous signals. Just be sure you catch it all on tape.

name: Star Hearts: Hoshi to Daichi no Shisha
summary: Star Hearts: Hoshi to Daichi no Shisha is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2001.

You have multiple option as to how the story will go.

name: Star Guard
summary: Star Guard is a 2D platformer brought back to the basic elements of the genre: jumping and shooting, with a distinct retro look. Enemies are red, allies are green and the levels consist of yellow lines against a black background. The player controls a spaceman on a mission to defeat an evil wizard, armed only with a single gun that fires in the direction the character is facing.

name: Starry Moon Island: Perimeter MP06
summary: This is a horizontal scroll shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the battle between the protagonist and the fat pig king for control of space. This DLC includes the map pack 06.

name: Street Karate Fighter 2 Online
summary: Fight against against 12 characters representing countries all over the world, to reach the two most powerful hidden fighters! In this mode you earn points to climb the "Arcade" leaderboard.

name: Streaking
summary: An escaped convict/naked woman tries to collect coins and articles of clothing plus bags of money while being chased by toy policemen.

name: Star Epica 3720
summary: Star Epica 3720 is an immersive space shooter that puts you at the center of a mining asteroid field. Put on your VR headset and protect your mining ship from asteroids as you collect resources and compete locally for the highest score in this endless survival shooter.

name: Steamburg
summary: Steamburg is an award-winning puzzle adventure game with story exploration elements and unique gameplay. Professor Vincent Moore fights a robot invasion. He is unarmed so he must be really smart. After destroying robots he can explore locations to find and rescue his fiancée.

name: Street Totochèr
summary: Street Totocher aims to showcase Reunion's culture and rich cultural diversity through a fighting video game.

name: Stump
summary:
Lumberjacks messed with wrong tree.

Courageous Stump sets out to chase after the lumberjacks, who caused him to stop being a beautiful tree. Lead Stump through five different lands, collecting his lost leaves and help him regain his lost shape.

The second mode of the game allows you to grow splendid trees starting from a seed and a pot of soil.

Key features:

- 142 levels
- 21 stump skins
- 21 tire skins
- Limitless golden owl mode
- 13 riddles to solve
- 14 types of trees to grow
- 14 types of pots

name: Strand Boy
summary: A demake of Death Stranding for the Game Boy.

name: Starry Sky: Winter Stories
summary: Starry Sky: Winter Stories is a bundle of both Starry Sky Winter games.

name: Still Dark at Dawn
summary: Built from the ground up for VR, Still Dark At Dawn's highly immersive gameplay will test your grit and ability to trust all of your senses, in a hope survive The Dawn.

name: Starry Moon Island: DNA War MP07
summary: This is a Tower Defense game. Players not only need to install different turrets for tanks, but also need to manually control turret attacks to break through enemy levels. This DLC includes the map pack 07.

name: Starry Moon Island: Out of Control MP07
summary: This is a horizontal scroll shooting game. Operate the player to break through the enemy's pursuit and reach the level on the far right. This DLC includes Map pack 07.

name: Starry Moon Island: DNA War MP02
summary: This is a Tower Defense game. Players not only need to install different turrets for tanks, but also need to manually control turret attacks to break through enemy levels. This DLC includes the map pack 02.

name: Starlynx
summary: Rescue your friend Axolotl in a starfox like game.

name: StoneBack
summary: Survive in this world is not so easy. The world in StoneBack fully randomly generated, and endless in all directions. You can walk wherever you want, no any borders.

name: Stock Car
summary:
Stock Car is an overhead-view racing video game written by A. W. Halse and published in the UK by Micro Power. It was released in 1984 for the BBC Micro, Acorn Electron, and Commodore 64 computers. Although the cassette inlay gives the release date as 1984, some sources state the release date as 1983, and the game is also known as Stock Car Racer.

Stock Car is similar to Atari, Inc.'s Sprint 2 arcade game (1976) and Indy 500 for the Atari VCS (1977).

name: Streamer Shall Not Pass!
summary: Asynchronous network game in which the creator of the room with the help of other players must go from beginning to end.You can also play alone.

name: Steamy Bathhouse
summary: Steamy Bathhouse is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards led by me, matador, working off a theme initially developed by 40oz.

name: Stealth Fighter Dec
summary: Inspired by flight sims of the '90s, you will be piloting a selection of fictional stealth fighter bombers over varied terrain completing procedurally generated missions such as precision bombing, clandestine intelligence gathering, close air support and many others.

name: Starithm
summary: Become the dominant star-fairing-civilization throughout the procedurally generated star systems. The player must establish/pursue: (1) Ideology; (2) Population; (3) Military assets; (4) 4x dominance (5) Technologies; (6) Artificial Evolution; (7) Cyber attacks; (8) Peace or war.

name: Starry Moon Island 2: DNA War MP03
summary: This is a Tower Defense game. The players need to install different turrets for tanks, but also need to manually control turret attacks to break through enemy levels. This DLC include the map pack 03.

name: Street Smart
summary: Street Smart is an Action game, developed and published by SNK, which was released in 1989.

name: StarsKnight
summary: This is a game that constantly iterates and updates. Before the final version, different gameplay will be updated to get through the iteration period. The final iteration of the game's main mode will be a galactic demon city game with a big map and a big story background!

name: Stop Robots
summary: There is a big disaster on a planet Rusty Head! The robots became compromised by the virus "Dummy Algorithm". The compromised robots propagate the virus with tremendous speed. The defective robots should be deactivated ASAP. Now have the General KillAllBots at your command. We promise you to supply the newest and best weapons: rockets, bombs, mines, droids.

name: Starbuster
summary: Starbuster is a fast-paced action platformer, where a droid and a lizard slash and grapple their way across the galaxy. Featuring a focus on fast paced combat, exploration, and weapon customisation. Rocket around, slap things, grab weapons and build your arsenal. You can't solve every problem by shooting at it but that shouldn't stop you from trying!​

name: StartBolita
summary: StartBolita is a game of puzzle based on Dodge and move boxes of colors.

name: StreamTeam
summary: StreamTeam is an upcoming squad-based strategic multiplayer game where you take part in an “away-team" fighting your enemies in space. Learn teamwork to defend your base from attackers, or leave your opponents in rubble. Get creative and become the best squad this side of the galaxy!

name: Starry Sky: After Autumn
summary: Starry Sky: After Autumn is a sequel to Starry Sky: In Autumn, continuing after the normal ending in the original game.

name: Stickman World Battle
summary: Stickman World Battle - new exciting and thrilling real-time strategy with famous stickman heroes!

name: Steaming Penguins
summary:
You are in charge of a ragtag group of penguins castaway on the open ocean. With dangers lurking from every corner it is your mission to build a tower to help defend and increase the number of your inhabitants!
Strategy is critical as lower floors will be destroyed by your enemies given enough time, requiring you to quickly adapt to an ever changing situation. Once you have collected enough resources you can evacuate as many penguins as possible on air ships before you are overrun!

name: Starry Moon Island: Tank Advance MP09
summary: This is a Top-Down Shooting game. Use the player of a fortress attack from the perspective of a tank driver. This DLC includes the map pack 09.

name: Stack,Clack,Clock!
summary: Stack, Clack, Clock! is a game about stacking bricks, where players build a tower one brick at a time.

name: Starry Moon Island: Tank Advance MP05
summary: This is a Top-Down Shooting game. Use the player of a fortress attack from the perspective of a tank driver. This DLC includes the map pack 05.

name: Starry Moon Island: Tank Advance MP10
summary: This is a Top-Down Shooting game. Use the player of a fortress attack from the perspective of a tank driver. This DLC includes the map pack 10.

name: Starry Moon Island: Cannon War MP08
summary: This is a Tower Defense game. Players break through enemy levels by installing different turrets on tanks. This DLC includes the map pack 08.

name: Starry Moon Island: Cannon War MP05
summary: This is a Tower Defense game. Players break through enemy levels by installing different turrets on tanks. This DLC includes the map pack 05.

name: Star Combat Online
summary: Star Combat is an online space shooter, as well as a genre of action packed simulator for free. A flexible aircraft customization system will capture your attention to the details of the combat vehicle technical equipment and allow you to create your own style of play, while the furious dynamics, drive and action of space battles with real rivals will not let you to be bored. In the game, you will encounter 18 warships, each of them has its own potential that you need to disclose.

name: Stop Cats
summary: Stop Cats, is a small, indie game, designed in a retro or slick style.

name: Stolen Memories II
summary: The emptiness of the chosen path entangles souls, preventing them from moving forward. The quiet, unbearably gentle withering continues, and only hope can stop it. Only hope can bring the smile to her face once more. "Stolen Memories" a non-linear visual novel with multiple endings.

name: Stranger Things: Puzzle Tales
summary: Dive into supernatural mysteries and immerse yourself in brand new, original storylines starring your favorite characters from the Netflix series while you explore a new Puzzle RPG experience!

name: Starry Moon Island: Star Ocean MP07
summary: This is a Top-Down shooting game in Space. It uses the player of the protagonist destroying the space surveillance system of the fat pig king. This DLC includes map pack 07.

name: Stacky Dash
summary: Dash your hero across the mazes, stack the tiles higher and higher, and reach for the skies!

name: Steal It
summary: Help the little redhead to steal all diamonds.

name: Story of the Green Dragon
summary: Dee is a distinguished martial artist recruited by a British intelligence agency takes part in a fierce fight against mysterious Cannabis drugs lord Taito, who is also responsible for Dee's fathers death. Together with agent Alice they discover the drug lair situated at an urban city...

name: Stick Man Rescue
summary: Countless innocent stick men will perish unless players do their heroic duty and rescue them in Stick Man Rescue. In this action/arcade game, players must pilot a futuristic troop transport copter as they fly through thirty dangerous levels filled with deadly traps in an attempt to rescue black stick men. The Evil Blue Stick Minions are out in force, with stick murder on their minds. Players must prevent their stick men from being burned alive, smashed, decapitated, blown up, electrocuted, dissolved by acid, and other classic demises. To combat the Evil Blue Stick Minions' zeppelins, paratroopers, and steam rollers, players can power up their copter with weapons like bombs, missiles, flame throwers, and more. Of course, players could just sit back and idly watch their stick men die hilariously horrible deaths...but then they wouldn't finish the level. What to do, what to do?

name: Star Wars: Galactic Laser Pinball Game
Strange Flesh
summary:
Welcome to Strange Flesh: a sexy, gay, adult beat 'em up game from Greatest Bear Studios.

You play the role of The Bartender, a master of the hypnotic arts and a servant of the bar, Strange Flesh. In the game, you'll infiltrate the mind of Joe, one of the bar's many troubled patrons and help him out however you see fit. Pummel your enemies into submission, corrupt them with your hypnotic smoke, or recruit them to your side. The choice is yours.

Strange Flesh is pretty short, just about 30 minutes long, but features three endings, lavish animation, and a killer soundtrack. Strange Flesh won the Melbourne Queer Games Festival Gold Medal in 2018!

name: Starlight River
summary:
Starlight River features stunning and unique multi-phase bosses, challenging encounters, tons of unique weapons for every class, a dynamic and in-depth approach to buildcrafting, and tons of secrets.
Will you walk the path countless shattered civilizations left behind? Will you harness the energies that destroyed them? Will you claim Starlight and make it your own? Will you find the Armillary? Will you unravel the weave of fate? Or will you be forgotten, lost in the space between constellations?

name: Starhack
summary: Welcome to STARHACK, a fast-paced action puzzler in space! Hack the enemy's systems by rotating a 2x2 section of tiles. Connect a line of same-colored squares from one side of the board to the other to clear the line and score! Be careful though; while the line can turn, it cannot branch or loop.

name: Strangest.io's My Megamix '21
summary: Seven awesome games made in seven adrenaline laced, drug-fueled days. One free price. Enter the mix. Sponsored by Parsec & Strangest.io!

name: Stupid Squad
summary: Stupid squad is pretty weird game.

name: StarWheels
summary: StarWheels: Battle Kart Arena is an exclusive multiplayer game. In StarWheels, The Battle takes place in an arena, in wich you can fight alone or with team mate and items to score points and win the fight ! Be the first to win the fight ! Show to the world and all other pilots you are the best !

name: StarSmashers
summary: You are Captain Carter, of the Space Beagle. Ahead lies an army lead by the scumbag Kaldor Seth, he will obliterate all who oppose him in his pursuit of power. Carefully manage your ships weapons and defenses to bring your enemies to their knees!

name: Star Child
summary: Star Child is an explosive new action-adventure set on a sinister alien planet. Fight numerous aliens and formidable bosses, wield powerful explosives and destructive laser weapons, find secrets and unlock new abilities as you progress. Can you survive your dangerous mission?

name: Stryker in the Crypts of Trogan
summary: As a noble and righteous wizard, you must beat the evil Trogan the Diabolical. This involves travelling through flick-screen Switchblade style environments both above and below ground. Using your sword, you must flatten Trogan's many henchmen, and avoid skeletons. You have limited energy, but can collect top-ups. Tokens to both improve and weaken your weaponry are also scattered throughout.

name: Starry Moon Island 2: Break Out MP07
summary: This is a fps game. It uses the player of the protagonist's raid and occupation of the fortress of the fat pig king. This DLC includes map pack 07.

name: Star Thief
summary: Star Thief is an action-adventure game in which you play as a space bandit, in a galaxy that has lost all sense of justice and order

name: StarMoon Forest
summary: Build your dream forest farm and apartment community! Plant all kinds of crops, make all kinds of delicious food and sell it in stores. Build apartments to attract residents from to live and maybe even find love.

name: Starry Moon Island: Out of Control MP06
summary: This is a horizontal scroll shooting game. Operate the player to break through the enemy's pursuit and reach the level on the far right. This DLC includes Map pack 06.

name: StarRunner
summary:
It is a time of war in your galaxy. Your people, the Atarians, defend against constant attacks from the Commodorians. Due to circumstances beyond your control (a fixed lottery), it has been decided that you, Rom Antic, must deliver vital details to a secret base hidden deep in a safe part of your galaxy.

You hop into your aging ship, the Pokey Cruiser, and take off with no time to spare.

Unfortunately, the shortest path to the base is blocked by 10 waves of deadly asteroids and mines.

Your rather BASIC laser can only dispatch the smallest asteroids, so you will need to rely heavily on evasive maneuvers to dodge your way through all 10 waves and safely reach your goal.

Good luck! Atarians in the galaxy are counting on you!

name: Storybook of Tactics
summary: Storybook of Tactics is a rogue-lite auto battler with deck building elements. Survive all the story chapters, upgrade unit cards, and experiment with dozens of builds while acquiring game-changing powers and powerful items.

name: Star Wars: Episode II - Anakin Skywalker’s Lightsaber Duel
Starry Navigator
summary: Starry Navigator is a RPG casual farming game. You can build your own planet with cute animals by planting. Gaining starry energy, the interstellar train will take you to explore the unknown universe, weave new stories with animal friends. Reopen galaxy routes and reflourish the desolate universe.

name: Storage Warfare
summary: Have you ever heard of a Storage Auction? Well Storage Auctions are modern day treasure hunts. In Storage Warfare, you attend storage auctions and your goal is to locate the treasures buried within the storage units, and then turn a profit! Keep a close eye on what is in each unit, so that you have the best chance to turn a profit. Outbid, Outsmart and Defeat your opponents in Storage Warfare!

name: Stroop Test for Research and Teaching
Striker
summary:
Striker is a Sega Mega Drive. It was only released in Europe and Australia.

Confusingly it is the fourth game by Rage Software to use the Striker moniker - the original Striker was released for the Amiga in 1992 (later ported to the Amiga CD32 in 1994) and formed the basis for all Striker games to come. A second Striker was released for the Super Nintendo in 1993, being known as World Soccer '94: Road to Glory in North America, World Soccer in Japan and Eric Cantona Football Challenge in France, which was followed by World Cup Striker (released as Elite Soccer in North America) the next year. This fourth Striker was made exclusive to Sega systems as a spiritual sequel to Ultimate Soccer.

name: Stream Town
summary: A stream-interactive RTS game that requires you to collect resources, defeat enemies, protect your town and expand!

name: Stand 'em Up
summary: Punish your enemies, take their money, acquire new skills, supermoves… and eat shawarma! All this in a tornadic action “Stand 'em up” following the traditions of classic-style beat 'em ups.

name: Storming the Grandmothership
summary: How fast can you destroy the Grandmothership and all of her cores? This game was heavily influenced by the third level of R-Type.

name: STDS00751 R+R
summary: Shooting game for the X68000

name: Storm Chasers: Tornado Islands
summary: One of the coolest Match3 games! Join Alex, her friend Professor Finch and her faithful dog Muffin in over 80 match-3 levels and rebuild a cloud village destroyed by a gigantic tornado!

name: Stump Simulator
summary: Stump Simulator is a game in which you can become a tree stump.

name: Star Hogs: Online & Campaign Battles
summary: Think Worms in space

name: Style Savvy
summary: Style Savvy combines creativity and fashion with a collection of trendy clothes, chic accessories and stylish shoes. As the owner of a clothing boutique, you must purchase inventory, monitor the store's funds and try to please a constant stream of customers who look to you for the best fashions.

name: Strands
summary: Strands is a New York Times word puzzle where the goal is to use every letter on the board to find today's linked words plus their hidden theme. You don't know which words you're looking for until you correctly discover them or use hints. Try to win without using any!

name: StrongBadZone
summary: StrongBadZone is a vector graphics game that plays similarly to the Diamonds 3D game for the PC and Mac. You are a spikey-headed cyber-shield guy (with a cyber-shield) trying to block "perplexing 3D geometric attacks" that come flipping toward you. If you hit them, they bounce back. The object of the game is to try to hit Vector Strong Bad's head until it disappears. The game's graphical style appears to be a reference to Nintendo's ill-fated 3D system, the Virtual Boy. The graphics of the console were well-known for solely consisting of the colors red and black, much like those in StrongBadZone. In particular, the game stylistically resembles the Virtual Boy vector game Red Alarm, which at one point also features a large face that must be destroyed.

name: Starry Moon Island: Cannon War MP06
summary: This is a Tower Defense game. Players break through enemy levels by installing different turrets on tanks. This DLC includes the map pack 06.

name: Street Fighter V: E.Honda
summary: This DLC adds Honda as a fighter.

name: Stray Doom
summary: Stray's cat rips and tears through demonic hordes in brilliant upcoming Doom mod This mod lets you play as the cat from Stray in the original Doom, and you can shoot your way through the game as the cat. But not only that, but you will be playing in third-person.

name: StarCat Major
summary: A lo-fi space adventure.

name: Star Hearts: Launch Point
summary: Star Hearts: Launch Point is a tight 2D action adventure featuring an 8-bit retro aesthetic in classic NES-fashion. Journey to the galaxy’s edge and discover the origins of Prin - an interstellar revolutionary in the making - as she embarks upon her first space-faring adventure!

name: Stones of Flesh
summary: Make your way through a land of unknown horrors, where the walls are made of flesh and seem to breathe as one. Defend yourself against the creatures with unique abilities in RPG combat.

name: Stupid Dungeon
summary: It has become a habit for an anchor to stop updating the video. He lives in a beautiful sound every day and can't extricate himself. Suddenly one day, when he woke up, everything around him had changed, and all evils would be liquidated here.

name: StudioS Fighters: Climax Champions
summary: An entire generation of StudioS characters all fighting to be #1! Fight your way to the top with satisfying and easy to execute combos! A unique retro-style game inspired by 90s era handheld fighting games!

name: Streamer Simulator
summary:
Streamer Simulator is a simulation being streamer.
Change your old life for the better. You can become the world’s greatest streamer in history.

name: Starwatchers: The Search for Cosmic Jam
summary: Roadtrip across the universe and create the most delicious jam!

name: Stranded Shootout
summary: Stranded Shootout is a roguelike bullet hell game about a space marine who crash-landed on an unknown planet. Upon awakening, the marine realizes that he and his ship are besieged by hostile aliens. Test your skills and see how long you can endure the endless onslaught.

name: Stunt Wheels
summary:
Yes! The Magnificent Stunts are back and this time they're racing around the backlots and studios of Stuntwood.
Battle to destroy your dastardly stunt rivals; Stunt Guy, Stunt Gail, Mucus, Danger-Susan and Nurse Long... and watch out for oil slicks, TNT and squirrels as you race masses of different cars through beached pirate ships, backflip over huge canyons, barrel-roll through rings of fire and smash your way through the competition with the crazy power ups including: - purple-hot Laser Wang, crushing Monsta Mode, tommy-gun wielding Mob Mode and the almost useless Mole Mode!

name: Stars Below
summary: There are stars below the surface

name: Starduster
summary: STARDUSTER is a musical and arcade game wrapped in an abstract aesthetic with neon lights designed for players who enjoy difficult challenges and seek to push their own limits.

name: Star Trek: Secret of Vulcan Fury
summary: An unreleased Star Trek title from Interplay that was shown at E3 '98. The game centered around the war between the Romulans and Vulcans.

name: Story Time Bundle
summary: This bundle features the games of the Life of Fly series and the Murder Diaries series. It is a pack of 5 story driven flight exploration games. In each of the games you will experience an exciting story while exploring the landscapes and piecing together the overall story

name: Stone it!
summary: Stone it! is a logic puzzle game where you roll the block to the target through winding paths, elevators, bridges. Think over your steps and use lasers to clear your way.

name: Star Arthur Densetsu II: Ankoku Seiun
summary: Star Arthur Densetsu II: Ankoku Seiun (Legend of Star Arthur II: Dark Nebula) is an adventure game released by T&E Soft in 1983.

name: Star Age: Space Combat
summary: Get ready to fly and challenge your friends in this multiplayer arcade space shooter!

name: Starry Sky: After Summer Portable
summary: Starry Sky: After Summer Portable is a port of Starry Sky: After Summer for the PlayStation Portable.

name: Starry Moon Island 2: Break Out MP03
summary: This is a fps game. It uses the player of the protagonist's raid and occupation of the fortress of the fat pig king. This DLC includes map pack 03.

name: Steampunk Racing 3D
summary: In the realm of steampunk racing domination and destruction is a way of life. Each day we risk death for the rewards and thrills of our chosen path. We are the racers, the heroes of our war torn world. Our vehicles shield us, our weaponry brings forth our vengeance, the world is our playground, and the corporations that run things are a necessary evil.

name: Stunt Car Challenge 3
summary:
Stunt Car Challenge has returned in real 3D with easy to learn controls and mechanics.
Perform amazing stunts with a stunt car! Drive on tracks with jumps and obstacles! Race against a train! Beat the cops in San Francisco! Start playing the fun tracks right now, and challenge yourself to get three stars from all levels!
Complete the Arizona levels, and open San Francisco city and port levels! Beware of the trolley cars and cops in San Francisco though.

name: Strings of Light
summary: Take a moment to introspect as you aim for higher goals.

name: Starpuffs
summary: Your Starpuffs are in trouble! You need to rescue them! Split and merge your way through over 100 increasingly challenging and complex levels in this cute and colourful puzzle game. Can you save all the Starpuffs?

name: Strange Investigations: Becoming
summary: A Strange New Beginning!

name: Stellar Warrior: Master Levels
summary: Sellar Warrior is a classic upscrolling spaceshooter for one or two players in a bullet-hell gameplay style! rank up to get to the best score on the Steam leaderboards and unlock all those achievements!

name: Stickman Party
summary:
Stickman Party is a unique arcade game created so that you can have fun in the company of friends, as well as Stickmen!

Here is a whole collection of addictive and very exciting games for every day, play wherever and whenever. Compete with your friends or family in more than 30 different types of competitive games, this arcade will allow you to play immediately 1 2 3 and four players on one device. Fight on powerful tanks in hot dueling, play soccer in team battles 2 on 2 or 1 on 1, take part in crazy car races and fight in an open area in a battle where the strongest wins!

name: Stella Arcana
summary:
Want to play an innovative MMORPG? Want a game that mixes thrilling action-RPG combat and relaxing casual game modes? Want a game with a gorgeous art-style and soundtrack? Want exciting team-based dungeons and raids? 
 
Stella Arcana, a tale of bravery and light! Come and join us in the fight to save the Light Realm!

name: Steel Eagle: Cave Mission
summary: Another 20 boards are waiting for you. This time, an additional difficulty will be narrow corridors and chambers in the caves in which you will pilot the Steel Eagle.

name: Stellar Hunter
summary: Stellar Hunter is a space-themed RPG with upgraded roguelike elements to make it full of possibilities. You can even clear stages by simply rolling a dice, and the darkened-map with uncertainties inherited from Dungeon Survivor II will surely spice up your experience.

name: Steam-Heart's
summary:
In the far future, on an alien planet dominated by seven elf-like or catgirl princesses that have fallen under the spell of a unique virus that has driven them mad and threatens to destroy the planet if all the rulers declare all-out war. 
 
Only Blondia Varady and his sister Fallandia have been spared from the disease and must pilot their fighter ships in order to penetrate deep into the domain of each princess, destroy their war machines, and administer the antidote. Fortunately for Blow, the antidote has been synthesized into his reproductive organ, so that means there is only one way to inoculate the girls....

name: Starry Moon Island: Red Snake MP05
summary: This is a Top-Down shooting game. Use the player of the main character's escape from prison. This DLC includes the map pack 05.

name: Street Dunk
summary: Street Dunk is a cancelled baskteball game that was in development by Nippon Bussan (aka Nichibutsu) for the Super Nintendo / Super Famicom.

name: Star Climber
summary: Build your ladder into the sky to collect stars, but watch out for stray satellites! Collect three stars to win.

name: Strange Encounter
summary: You are a ufologist investigating recent UFO sightings in a region of the Swiss Alps. Enjoy an original adventure full of mysteries !

name: Striker: World Cup Special
summary: World Cup Tournament action with teams from 24 countries. You can do pass, trap, sliding tackle and more as a player. Six parameters for each player give them realistic character.

name: Street Sports Baseball
summary: In Street Sports Baseball, one or two teams could choose to battle it out in a urban, inner-city areas rather than stadiums.

name: StarLight
summary:
StarLight is an absolutely addictive game! You never wanna miss it!
You will be a lonely star, looking for the light from other stars in the universe.

name: Stay Alive: Apocalypse
summary: You ever played a Sandbox Survival Zombie RPG? You heard it right. In "Stay Alive: Apocalypse" we will offer you an indie zombie survival game which is in a sandbox, random generated world and presents RPG elements.

name: Stuck in the Dark
summary: Escape the spooky hospital

name: Star Cruiser
summary: An early first-person role-playing shooter released by Arysis Software for the PC-88 and PC-98 in 1988, and later ported to the Sharp X68000 and Mega Drive/Genesis. Ahead of its time, it had 3D polygon graphics, FPS gameplay, strafing controls, open-world space exploration, and an epic sci-fi space opera plot.

name: Stellaris: Console Edition - The Royal
summary:
Explore different stars, get acquainted with a wide variety of races, and deepen interaction. Dispatch research vessels, construction vessels, and sometimes warships to build a giant galactic empire. Each of your actions will determine the fate of the entire galaxy and bring evolution, development, and conflict to the various races living in it. Like other large-scale strategy games, this game will evolve over time. With the active free updates that characterize Paradox games, you'll always be able to keep your empire expanding with the latest technology and features.

Stellaris: Console Edition - The Royal includes the Console Edition for Stellaris and Expansion pass one + two.

name: Stalker: The Way of Survival
summary: A game with RPG elements and the melancholy beauty of a world that has survived a nuclear disaster. It has everything: a hero without memory, residents without help, enemies without punishment. Your task is to restore order, both in the outside world and in yourself. The main values ​​are eternal values: food, weapons, medicines... You are a stern character, not particularly talkative and purposeful. Have you woken up? Follow me! The village elder with the gentle name Anna will give you your first task.

name: StereoPaint
summary: StereoPaint is a VR 3d sculpting app that uses paint style interactions to create colorful voxelized models in real time. Manipulate virtual material as if it were clay using additive, subtractive or soft matter action.

name: Stagelands: Eternal Defense
summary: Defend your lands from crowds of enemies! Create a unique multi-floor defense of your kingdom! Arrange your troops wisely, use ancient magic, repel the onslaught of the enemy!

name: Stranded: Escape the Room
summary: Tom and Jen wake up in an unfamiliar room of a strange house. Your challenge is to help them escape the room. Tap to move / find / use objects. Solve puzzles by tapping to interact.

name: Sticky Slimes
summary: Stick Together To Reach New Places!

name: Stylish Sprint 2
summary: A sequel to Stylish Sprint a simple run-jump-and-bash iOS game.

name: StreetMobsters
summary:
In StreetMobsters you own your own mafia empire in a multiplayer world where you can work together with your family! 
 
Participate in wars against other families and fight for more cartel areas to sell more and more drugs! Or just take a fight against the thousands of other players in a PvP battle, stealing their cash and meth! If this is too easy for you than start to battle against lots of bosses alone and together with your family! 
 
Becoming the very best mafiosi around is the goal of the game, gaining power by countless type of ways and upgrading your Empires! Sell weed, meth, tobacco, xtc, oil,... are just a few illegal activities that you can earn cash with! 
 
Come and see there is plenty more to do in this awesome mafia game!

Stinkoman 20X6 is a side-scrolling platformer game which stars Stinkoman. This game is based on the classic Capcom Mega Man series. It also parodies the poor Japanese to English translations common to video games of that era, similar to those that appear on the current Games Menu. The game is currently unfinished, but on January 6, 2018, @StrongBadActual announced that its final level is scheduled to release in 2018. A further announcement coming on December 28, 2018 stated that the release will be in 2019, and another pushed it back to 2020, concluding after a 15-year hiatus.

The game underwent major changes during the development and eventually became a more straightforward dungeon/space shooter RPG running on the Might & Magic 3 engine.

In this game, you are a member of a mercenary squad of infantry mechs contracted by the government to do dirty jobs. Eventually you gain access to a space ship and travel the galaxy to deal with an alien invasion.

The series was originally intended to comprise three episodes, but the third game was never released. The game was eventually delisted from the Apple App Store.

In this game, players control a human-like avatar, aiming to survive and get stronger equipment. The objective of the game is to survive and accumulate the most points in the server, which can be accomplished by collecting resources, killing mobs and other players, and completing quests. This game grew in popularity after its initial release, and used to serve about 1000-2000 players simultaneously on 30 servers. Currently, the game serves not more than 200 players simultaneously on less than 25 servers.
